name: Stichting United Peoples Assembly
goal:
NAME AND SEAT
Article 1.
1.1. The foundation bears the name: United Peoples Assembly, abbreviated name: UPA Foundation.
1.2. She has her seat in Voorburg.
1.3. She will hereafter also be referred to as 'the foundation'.

PURPOSE, MEANS TO REACH THE AIM.
Article 2.
2.1. The purpose of the foundation is: to support minorities, nations and peoples in their efforts to achieve greater cultural, political and economic self-determination and to carry out all further actions that are connected with the foregoing in the widest sense or that can be conducive to this. to be.
2.2. The foundation tries to achieve this goal by:
a. the creation of a platform where minorities, nations and peoples can express their needs and form a community of interests;
b. the creation and management of facilities for training and communication;
c. organizing conferences, seminars, events, activities and / or meetings;
d. the raising of funds;
e. providing information, advice and / or guidance;
f. to cooperate with various organizations and institutions;
g. to do everything at the national or international level or to have this done what is necessary, useful and / or desirable in the opinion of its management.
2.3. The foundation does not aim at making a profit
interests: Culture and media, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian aid and civil protection
euInitiatives: The initiatives that we follow most intensively are those of the Accession Talks with the Western Balkan countries and those of the External Action Service where it relates to minority rights, development and rule of law. We also follow the AFET and DROI committees.
